# Excal Repo

Instructions
------
# Install Jekyll
Per instructions: https://jekyllrb.com/docs/installation/

# Download Excal Repo

# Choose Location
Update URL and BaseURL in _config.yml

# Change into your new directory
cd ~/excal-repo

# Update Content
Index.md

# Build pages
jekyll build

# Serve Pages
jekyll serve

# Load Site In Browser
Example: http://localhost:4000/excal-repo/index.html

------
